Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:55:36 +0000 A former Christchurch Boys’ High School teacher has told the Employment Relations Authority she believes headmaster Nic Hill “left faeces” at her property eight times in “retaliation” for her raising concerns about him with the board and police. Photos / NZME
